row.subject: Recommended Offer by ICE for IPE Holdings
row.content:
M1.1. This is to point out to you the approaching deadline for accepting ICE's Offer for IPE Holdings.
[Inform: purpose of message]
M1.2. If we wish to accept this Offer, we must do so no later than 3 pm on Tuesday 29 May.
[Inform: deadline for accepting offer]
M1.3. In the meantime, Michael has received calls from Richard Ward (IPE's CEO) inquiring as to our position,
M1.4. and it would be my view that we should accept the Offer.
[Inform: Richard Ward would like to know position/Justin Boyd thinks offer should be accepted]
M1.5. (Note that if ICE receives acceptances of 90% or more, then our shares in IPE Holdings will in any event be mandatorily acquired.
M1.6. And assuming that such level of acceptances will be received, there is no reason for not accepting the Offer).
[Inform: shares may be mandatorily acquired pending high acceptance rate/no reason not to accept offer]
M1.7. Please would you let me know whether you wish to accept the Offer. [Y]
[Request-Information: whether email recipients wish to accept the offer]
Flink1.7
M1.8. Ideally, if we are to do so, I would plan to send the acceptance by close of business on Friday 25 May.
[Inform: Justin would like to send the acceptance by May 25]
M1.9. Thanks
[Conventional: thanks]
M1.10. Justin
[Conventional: signature]

row.subject: Recommended Offer by ICE for IPE Holdings
row.content:
M2.1. Your thoughts on this?
[Request-Information: thoughts]
Flink2.1
M2.2. Also, assuming we accept, then what?
M2.3. Are we an owner in ICE?
[Request-Information: what happens when offer is accepted/does it make recipients of email owners in ICE]
Blink1.7
Flink2.3
M2.4. GP
[Conventional: signature]

row.subject: Recommended Offer by ICE for IPE Holdings
row.content:
M3.1. Greg, Andy
[Conventional: salutation]
M3.2. If we accept the Offer, and assuming the Offer receives sufficient acceptances from the other IPE shareholders, then we would hold equity in ICE
M3.3. (in the form of A and B Shares)
[Inform: Justin explains what happens when offer is accepted]
Blink2.3
Sflink3.3
M3.4. Justin
[Conventional: signature]

row.subject: Recommended Offer by ICE for IPE Holdings
row.content:
M4.1. OK, so how much do we own
M4.2. and what rights will we have
M4.3. and do we do anything with it?
[Request-Information: how much do they own/what rights/what to do with it]
Blink3.3
Flink4.3
M4.4. GP
[Conventional: signature]

row.subject: Recommended Offer by ICE for IPE Holdings
row.content:
M5.1. How much would we own and how much control would we have, if any?
[Request-Information: how much owned and how much control]
Blink3.3
Flink5.1
M5.2. Thanks.
[Conventional: thanks]
M5.3. GP
[Conventional: signature]

row.subject: Recommended Offer by ICE for IPE Holdings
row.content:
M6.1. Greg
[Conventional: salutation]
M6.2. We would hold less than 1% of the equity in ICE -
M6.3. so no control at all
[Inform: would own < 1%, so no control]
Blink5.1
Sflink6.3
M6.4. Justin
[Conventional: signature]

row.subject: Recommended Offer by ICE for IPE Holdings
row.content:
M7.1. Does our less than 1% get us more relavent info than if we just pulled from publically available?
[Request-Information: difference between < 1% and pulling from publicly available]
Blink6.3
Flink7.1
M7.2. GP
[Conventional: signature]
